I am a Lead AI Scientist in the Speech team at IBM with a goal to create profitable products from cutting-edge AI, often leading to new frontiers in research.
My expertise is in [Efficient AI](portfolio/edgeAI.qmd), where I have worked on pruning, quantization, edge deployments, and novel efficient architectures. My previous roles have also led me to contribute to the open-source Python library [brightwind](portfolio/wind_energy.qmd). Check out my [portfolio](portfolio.qmd) for more information.



<b>Educational Background</b>: I graduated from St. Stephen's College, Delhi, and completed a Master's degree in Computational Science from University College Dublin, where my thesis focused on machine learning.
